title: 09/17: Waiver Wire and Injury Reactions, and Daniel Jones! (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We begin the show with our reactions to Ben Roethlisberger's injury (2:20) and Drew Brees' injury (6:20). How are we valuing the Steelers and Saints now? Is Alvin Kamara still a first round pick? Then we run through the rest of the big news and give you our top Waiver Wire priorities regardless of position (11:30) ... Top 3 priorities at each position (18:30) to give you a sneak peak at the Waiver Wire. We discuss Josh Allen, Matthew Stafford, Jaylen Samuels, the Chiefs WRs, Greg Olsen, DSTs and more. Then we recap CLE-NYJ (36:15). Is Jarvis Landry droppable? Le'Veon or Chubb rest of season? ... Dropometer (42:10), Team Name Tuesday (43:30) and a look at waiver wire options at QB (44:00), RB (46:00), WR (51:10), TE (59:00), DST and Kicker. Plus IDP!  Then we spend the final 5 minutes reacting to breaking news about Daniel Jones starting (1:02:30) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
